Just wanted to let the mods know that from September 14th, through the twen=
ty third, I will not be here. I'll be in Italy visiting my Grandmother.  If=
 someone could please take Tucson for me for that time, I'd deeply apprecia=
te it.  I even give permission to move him as an NPC until my return.  Than=
k you very much, Sandy.
